per_frame_init_1=state = 0;
per_frame_1=bass_clip = above(bass_att,bass_clip)*2 + (1-above(bass_att,bass_clip))*((bass_clip-1.3)*0.96+1.3);
per_frame_2=basstime = basstime + (bass_att*0.09);
per_frame_3=
per_frame_4=//increment
per_frame_5=state = state + equal(bass_clip,2);
per_frame_6=state = if(above(state,4),0 , state);
per_frame_7=
per_frame_8=//punlish

per_frame_12=monitor = time;

per_pixel_3=//simple fuzzy rules

per_pixel_5=rule2 = (0.5-y);

per_pixel_7=rule1 = rule1*sin(q3);
per_pixel_8=rule2 = rule2*sin(q3+3.14);

per_pixel_10=

per_pixel_15=sy = 1 + rule1*rule2;
